_sText:
Bug to fix : Dont kick player that drive vehickles and dont change map when you drive vehicles this make Crash the map. Game_ui entity dont like this =) I will try fix this bug.

hii 

I have work long time to make this vehicles so i hope you like it. Thanks to Spawi help made server so i can test my map and see all bug in server.

Map info: I have flag in CT and T oil platform and 1 in the house. So when you have activate all flag then the enemy will die and you win. Player that activate last flag get 3 point. You can use vehicle to defend yourself from sniper =) 

- 90sc byzon.
- Ammo box in ct and t spawn and in house.
- Speed and gravity mode in ct and t spawn, ore normal with more health.
- 2 boat 1 driver and can take passengers on board.  
- 2 Apache helicopter 1 driver and missil user. 1 mashingun user.
- 2 Tank 1 driver and flame user, 1 canon user, 1 mashingun user.
- 2 plane 1 driver and missile user.
- 2 Hummer 1 driver and mashingun user, and 3 passengers can enter. 
- 2 custom weapon 1 RPG user and 1 mine user.
- 3 flag to activate. 
- All vehicles will autorespawn after break.

[Video...](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2RmQi69UEpk "video")

If you find any bug ore any changes just tel me, and i will try fix it.
If your server crash then see this [Assertion failed crash...](http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?p=25976394 "crash")
